```{r}
library(dbpedia)
library(polmineR)
```

```{r}
article <- corpus("NADIRASZ") %>%
  subset(article_id == "A70041931")
```


```{r}
read(article)
```

```{r}
links <- get_dbpedia_links(x = article, language = "de", mw = "ne_type")

read(article, annotation = links)
```
